name: wrap
label: Wrap Deformer
description:
Multi-threaded wrap deformer (C++) for maya with rebind capabilities and custom octree for faster bind.
Developped at Mikros Animation and  used on several feature films.

name: collide
label: Collision Deformer
description:
Multi-threaded collision deformer (C++) for maya
Developped at Mikros Animation and  used on several feature films.

name: wire
label: Wire Deformer
description:
Multi-threaded wire deformer (C++) for maya.
Developped at Mikros Animation and  used on several feature films.
